sentences.en: Air - feeding sleeves with considerably higher turbine torques are rejected and probably reworked.
sentences.cn: 涡轮力矩相当高的 馈 气套简应予退回,或许还得重新加工.

sentences.en: Before the air enters the turbine, fuel is sprayed into it.
sentences.cn: 在空气进入涡轮之前, 燃料就喷进了.

sentences.en: Damage to the turbine slowed the work down.
sentences.cn: 涡轮机的损坏降低了工作的效率。

sentences.en: Designs and manufactures turbine engine test cells and wind tunnels.
sentences.cn: 设计生产涡轮发动机测试单元和风洞.

sentences.en: In a steam turbine, steam from pipes is directed onto the blades.
sentences.cn: 涡轮机内的蒸汽从管内导至叶片上.

sentences.en: In practice, the turbine disc and the nozzles are fitted into a casing.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 涡轮圆盘和喷嘴是装在机壳里的.

sentences.en: SHEN Zu - yi . Hydro Turbine Regulation. Beijing: Hydraulic and Hydroelectricity Press, 1998.
sentences.cn: 沈祖诒. 水轮机调节. 北京: 水利水电出版社, 1998.

sentences.en: The gas turbine feeds on the fuel it pumps.
sentences.cn: 这台燃气轮机以它抽入的燃料为能源.

sentences.en: The new ship will be powered by two gas turbines and four diesel engines.
sentences.cn: 那艘新轮船将由2台燃气涡轮机和4台柴油机驱动。

sentences.en: The paper is a survey of electrical control systems of wind turbine.
sentences.cn: 综述了风力发电机组的电气控制.

sentences.en: The shaft of the turbine is coupled to the rotor of the generator.
sentences.cn: 汽轮机的轴与发电机转子相连结.

sentences.en: The spinning turbine creates a vacuum.
sentences.cn: 旋转的涡轮形成了一块真空区域。

sentences.en: The turbine is spun by the high - pressure gases.
sentences.cn: 涡轮由高压燃气驱动旋转.

sentences.en: The work consisted of throwing up embankments and installing water turbine pumps.
sentences.cn: 这项工作包括快速建起堤坝和安装涡轮水泵.

sentences.en: This steam is used to turn turbine blades of electric generators.
sentences.cn: 这蒸汽被用来推动发电机的涡轮叶片.

sentences.en: Would you know a working mechanical governor for a wind turbine if you saw one?
sentences.cn: 你知道怎么分辨风力涡轮的机械调速器的好坏 么 ?

trans.tran_en: an engine or motor in which the pressure of a liquid or gas moves a special wheel around
